RC1

Not sure what I was doing.  I was in the Resources Perspective.   I had an 
editor on a saved snippet file opened.  I was switching back and forth between 
editors.

This looks like we are attempting to add a listener to a the 
Collections.EMPTY_LIST. However, we only set the listener collection to an 
empty list when the editor is disposed. Likely a rare occurrence. However, we 
should change the implementation to set the list to "null" when disposed, and 
add the appropriate null checks into the code.
